security.strict.title: Strict
security.insecureLocalContent.title: Allow insecure local content
security.insecureLocalContent.descriptio: Enable loading content over HTTP served from localhost.
security.insecureContent.title: Allow insecure content
security.disable.title: Disable
security.disable.description: Allow all content and script execution. Not recommended.
security.enableSecurityWarning.title: Enable preview security warnings in this workspace
security.disableSecurityWarning.title: Disable preview security warning in this workspace
security.toggleSecurityWarning.title: Please note that it does not affect the content security level.
security.showPreviewSecuritySelector.tit: Select security settings for Asciidoc previews in this workspace.
security.restrictAsciidoctorExtensionsAu: Prevent code execution by disabling Asciidoctor.js extensions.
security.trustAsciidoctorExtensionsAutho: Allow code execution by activating Asciidoctor.js extensions.
security.asciidoctorExtensionsTrustModeS: Select the trust mode for the Asciidoctor.js extensions in this workspace.
